title: Lucky For You
description: Ready for a fresh start, single mom Keira Jennings has discovered a slice of heaven in the mountain town of Whispering Springs, California. Police Chief Rex Malone is smitten at first sight for the charming new resident of his hometown. Sparks fly after a routine stop. Has Keira’s Luck changed for the better? Or is Rex just like every man she’s ever met?
author: Mayra Statham
